deleteAccountWarning: This action will permanently delete your account and all your data. Please enter your password to confirm.
usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
emailChangeSecurityNote: You may be asked to log in again for security reasons.
check_mailbox_desc: We sent a link to change your password to {{email}}.
check_mailbox_desc2: If this email exists in our system, you'll soon receive a link to change your password.
send_again_info: You can send again in {{seconds}} seconds.

manageSubscription.title: Manage subscription
manageSubscription.benefitDesc_unlimitedAiChat:
Premium: No daily message limits — chat with your AI dietitian anytime, as much as you want.
Free: Limited to 5 AI messages per day.
manageSubscription.benefitDesc_fullCloudBackup:
Premium: Automatic, unlimited backup of all meals and settings. Restore your full history on any device.
Free: Limited backup and restore.
manageSubscription.benefitDesc_unlimitedAiMealRecognition:
Premium: Unlimited AI analysis of meals — photos (Vision) and text descriptions. Get ingredients and macros instantly, without limits.
Free: 1 meal analysis per day.
manageSubscription.benefitDesc_fullHistoryAccess:
Premium: Browse and analyze your entire history with advanced filters and time ranges.
Free: Access limited to the last 30 days.
manageSubscription.benefitDesc_earlyAccess:
Premium: Try upcoming features and tools before anyone else. Exclusive early access for premium members!
Free: New features become available after official release and some of them will never be able for free users.
manageSubscription.billingUnavailable: Billing is unavailable on this device.

password_min_length: Password must be at least {{count}} characters
new_password_must_be_different: New password must be different from current password
weak_password: The new password is too weak
camera_permission_message: Camera access is required to take a profile photo.
exportSuccess: Your data has been prepared and should appear in your sharing options.
feedbackDescription: Share your thoughts, suggestions, or issues. We appreciate every message!
addAttachmentDescription: Optional: attach a screenshot to help us understand the issue
feedbackAppInfo: Your app version and device info will be sent automatically to help us improve CaloriAI.
checkConnection: Please check your connection and try again.
feedbackSendError: Failed to send feedback. Try again later.
exportSavedSuccess: Your data has been saved as a PDF: {{filename}}. A sharing window has been opened.
